channel.title: Emery County|Utah|United States on Roadsign Pictures
channel.description: Recent content in Emery County|Utah|United States on Roadsign Pictures

item.title: BL-70/UT-19 East at I-70 West
item.description: BL-70/UT-19 East at I-70 West to Salina.

item.title: US-6 East/US-191 South - Emery County
item.description: Entering Emery County on US-6 East/US-191 South.

item.title: US-6 West/US-191 North - Distance Marker
item.description: Distance marker on US-6 West/US-191 North. Distance to Price and Salt Lake. Taken just north of I-70.

item.title: I-70 East - Exit 160
item.description: I-70 east at Exit 160 - BL-70/UT-19/Green River.

item.title: US-6 East/US-191 South at I-70
item.description: US-6 East/US-191 South at I-70. Merge right for I-70 west; merge left for US-191 South and US-16 East (not signed here). US-191 joins I-70 east to Crescent Junction. US-6 joins I-70 east to Fruita, Colorado.

item.title: US-6 East/US-191 South at I-70
item.description: US-6 East/US-191 South at I-70. Use I-70 west for Salina; I-70/US-6 East/US-191 South for Green River.

item.title: US-6 East/US-191 South Approaching I-70
item.description: US-6 East/US-191 South approaching I-70. Use I-70 west for Hanksville; use I-70 East/US-6 East/US-191 South for Moab (via US-191 South) and Grand Junction (Colorado).

item.title: US-6 East/US-191 South Approaching I-70
item.description: Federal lands directions on US-6 East/US-191 South approaching I-70. Use I-70 west for Capitol Reef National Park and Lake Powell. Use I-70/US-6 East/US-191 South for Canyonlands National Park and Arches National Park.

item.title: US-6 East/US-191 South Approaching I-70
item.description: US-6 East/US-191 South approaching I-70 in Emery County. US-6 East joins I-70 east to Fruita, Colorado; US-191 south joins I-70 east to Crescent Junction.

item.title: I-70 West - Exit 99
item.description: I-70 west at Exit 99 - Ranch Exit

item.title: I-70 - Exit 108 Onramps
item.description: I-70 onramp at Exit 108.

item.title: I-70 West - Exit 108
item.description: I-70 west at Exit 108 - Ranch Exit

item.title: I-70 West - Exit 116
item.description: I-70 west approaching Exit 116 - Moore.

item.title: I-70 West - Exit 131
item.description: I-70 west approaching Exit 131 - Ranch Exit.

item.title: I-70 West - Exit 149
item.description: I-70 west at Exit 149 - UT-24 West/Hanksville.

item.title: I-70 West Approaching Exit 149
item.description: I-70 west approaching Exit 149. Use Exit 149 for Capitol Reef and Lake Powell.

item.title: I-70 West - Exit 157
item.description: I-70 west at Exit 157 - US-6 West/US-191 North/Price/Salt Lake.

item.title: UT-19 West at I-70/US-6/US-191 Onramps
item.description: UT-19 west at I-70 west onramp. US-6 and US-191 follow I-70.

item.title: UT-19 West Approaching I-70
item.description: UT-19 west approaching I-70. Use I-70 west for Price and Salina. Use I-70 east for Grand Junction (CO).

item.title: I-70 West - Exit 160
item.description: I-70 west at Exit 160 - UT-19/Green River.

item.title: I-70 West - Next Services 106 Miles
item.description: I-70 west approaching Exit 160. Exit 160 is the last exit with services on I-70 west for 106 miles.
